item.title: About
item.description: I am Alex working in tech since 1999 wore many hats spent lots of hours in Ops side spent lots of hours as platform engineer Currently focussed in cloud-native and hybrid environments Certs year short title description 2020 RHCS-Ansible Red Hat Certified Specialist in Ansible Automation - 2020 RHCE 7 Red Hat Certified Engineer - 2020 RHCSA 7 Red Hat Certified System Administrator - 2020 CKA Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 2014 VCP5-DCV VMware Certified Professional 5 - Data Center Virtualization - 2014 RHCE 6 Red Hat Certified Engineer - 2014 RHCSA 6 Red Hat Certified System Administrator - 2013 VCA-DCV VMware Certified Associate - Data Center Virtualization -
item.content:
I am Alex

  • working in tech since 1999
  • wore many hats
  • spent lots of hours in Ops side
  • spent lots of hours as platform engineer

Currently focussed in cloud-native and hybrid environments

Certs

year short title description
2020 RHCS-Ansible Red Hat Certified Specialist in Ansible Automation -
2020 RHCE 7 Red Hat Certified Engineer -
2020 RHCSA 7 Red Hat Certified System Administrator -
2020 CKA Certified Kubernetes Administrator -
2014 VCP5-DCV VMware Certified Professional 5 - Data Center Virtualization -
2014 RHCE 6 Red Hat Certified Engineer -
2014 RHCSA 6 Red Hat Certified System Administrator -
2013 VCA-DCV VMware Certified Associate - Data Center Virtualization -
